column5: You will love staying at this house! You will have your very own entrance with 24 hour key pad to enter. Enter through the front door with private entry that leads into your own space. Space includes one bedroom, a full bath, and a recreation room, (rec room has a futon, tv, and mini kitchen) Plenty of closet and storage space for belongings. Beautiful recent remodel with new everything! New furniture, new linens and towels, and fresh paint.   You will check in and not want to check out!
